remarks: Associativity of composition in a category using arrow notation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
statement:
arwlid.h $e |- H = ( HomA ` C ) $.
arwlid.o $e |- .x. = ( compA ` C ) $.
arwlid.a $e |- .1. = ( IdA ` C ) $.
arwlid.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( X H Y ) ) $.
arwass.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( Y H Z ) ) $.
arwass.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. ( Z H W ) ) $.
arwass $p |- ( ph -> ( ( K .x. G ) .x. F ) = ( K .x. ( G .x. F ) ) ) $.
